metadata.description:
Enter the retrofuturistic world of Mercy St. Clair, a talented and troubled bounty hunter navigating a society steeped in extreme violence on her journey of growth and self-discovery. 

Over 60 pages of brand-new color material! 

Ron Randall's sci-fi adventure opus! 

Mercy is on her emotional journey... adventures filled with strange technologies and creatures, far-flung politics, and lots and lots of action.",io9
metadata.name: Trekker
